name: LAZER (HardEggGames)
description:
In LAZER, you play as two robots who are testing a new Laser Powering Device. The goal is for both robots to safely reach the teleporter.  This Game was made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

-Controls:

Movement: WASD

Switch Robot: [Space]

Draw Laser: click and drag

Restart: R

Exit Game: [Esc] (only between transitions)
